alert.note: Alert for East Bay Interior Valleys; Eastern Santa Clara Hills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 7:44AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Alameda and eastern Contra Costa Counties through 815 AM PST... At 743 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pittsburg to 7 miles northeast of Milpitas. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Concord, Antioch, Livermore, San Ramon, Pleasanton, Milpitas, Pittsburg, Dublin, Danville, Oakley, Brentwood, Discovery Bay, Clayton, Byron, Knightsen, Blackhawk-Camino Tassajara, Blackhawk, Sunol, West Pittsburg Cdp and Bethel Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Interior Valleys; Eastern Santa Clara Hills
